attributes.action: Pay rise for all healthcare staff and care home staff including kitchen staff.
attributes.additional_details: Today 21st July 2020 the British government  announces Pay rise for public sector for the outstanding work the doctors,teachers and other parts of the public sector workers have done for this country through this pandemic.
attributes.background: the government should introduce a pay rise or pay a one off bonus payment for all care staff,supermarket workers and all other key workers including kitchen staff for the outstanding work during the coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for the wages of many of the people you list. 

They are responsible for NHS pay, so you might like to sign and share this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

You might also like to sign and share these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
